name: Zombie Outbreak (matty9)
description:
Fight off waves of zombies by building defences and unlocking weapons. How long can you survive?

Controls Building
  • Move player - Click on a tile
  • Move camera - WASD
  • Select building - Numbers, or hold shift when placing a building
  • Rotate building - R
Wave
  • Move player - WASD
  • Melee weapon - Left click
  • Shoot slingshot - Hold left click
  • Crossbow - Click to reload, click to shoot
